Description:
Parkland living at it's best!
Located directly opposite Hermsley Park in the Curlewis Parks Estate, this three bedroom beauty is being offered for sale for the first time. With all of the premium features that today's buyers are looking for, including spacious bedrooms with walk-in robes, formal lounge and the 2nd informal open plan kitchen meals family room flowing onto the alfresco entertaining. A well-appointed north-west facing alfresco area with pull-down awnings allows for all year entertaining. Some other features include:
- Impressive formal entrance
- Stainless steel kitchen appliances; including 900mm freestanding gas oven, with big wide burners and rangehood
- Premium floor coverings and timber louver window furnishings
- Established gardens
- Central bathroom with separate toilet
- Well thought-out floor-plan
- Gas ducted heating throughout
- Full ensuite including bath
This home is perfect for young families, investors, retirees/downsizers or anyone looking for convenience at a winning price. Contact us today to book your private viewing!

Description:
Prestige Home Waiting For You!
Nothing to do here the hard work is complete, move in kick back and invite family and friends over.
Quality and attention to detail are evident throughout this privately built home that definitely has a boutique feel. The owners have said that they built it as if it was to be their own home no corners cut here.
Designed with entertaining in mind, both living areas open onto a timber decked undercover alfresco area. Kitchen with a large island bench an abundance of cupboards and walk in pantry, stainless steel appliances incl. dishwasher.
Not only are there three bedrooms complete with ceiling fans there is a multi function room that could be used as a study, nursery, sewing room, utility room or even your own personal gym space.
Double glazed windows throughout; authentic timber flooring, reverse cycle air conditioning & under floor gas central heating contribute to the 6 star energy rating.
Currently tenanted, with 24 hours notice we can show you this lovely home.
Driveway, all paving, slim line water tank and higher than normal panel lift door complete the package.
Quiet location, opposite parkland.

Description:
Beautiful Family Home
This established Porter Davis home is only 4 years young and located within minutes of the new shopping centre. The home features 2 living areas and separate study. Open plan living/dining area at the centre of the home adjoins the well-appointed kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, walk-in pantry, dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and 900mm oven and cook top. The master bedroom features ceiling fan, WIR and ensuite, which includes a 1200mm shower and double vanity. The 2 remaining bedrooms featuring BIRs. Outside you will find an undercover decking perfect for entertaining with a ceiling fan and built in speakers. Other amazing features of this family home include low maintenance gardens, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double remote garage and solar panels. Don't wait to inspect as this beautiful home won't last long!
Terms...10% Deposit, 60 day Settlement... For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
A FINE EXAMPLE OF MODERN DESIGN!
If your wish list for your new home includes; an impressive contemporary design, tasteful modern finishes, quality fixtures and fittings and an exceptional floor plan which offers an abundance of natural light, then look no further than 52 Creekside Drive. This home has all the modern comforts; ducted heating, evaporative cooling; dual stone bench tops in the kitchen and the stone bench feature is carried through to both the ensuite and main bathroom, a double vanity in the ensuite and a luxurious designer bath in the family bathroom are just a few of the features that make this property one of the finest within the estate. Practical storage solutions, a clever study nook, double remote garage (with internal access), side access for the boat or caravan, lockable garden shed and family friendly back yard is simply just the icing on the cake. Located a short walk from parks and shops this is an excellent home for today and terrific investment for the future! Call today to arrange your private viewing!

Description:
Sensational Living
Quality finish, brilliant location, stunning outlook and functional design are all encapsulated in this amazing property being offered to the market for sale. Set on a large 749sq meter block of land, the home is designed to allow access into the rear isolated yard, whilst the house overlooks the stunning landscaped gardens and entertaining area. Comprising 3 spacious living areas, huge master bedroom with WIR, full ensuite and private balcony with views of the parklands and bay, a further 3 oversized bedrooms, central bathroom, and study with Powder room off the main entrance perfect for a home office. Including a large Solar heated in ground pool and entertaining area, double garage, heating and cooling throughout, 12 Panel Solar Electricity system, access to parklands and unsurpassed views, this stunning home is a must see for the growing family or those who like to live large!

Description:
LUXURIOUS LIVING
Driving down Avila Road, Curlewis, is like taking a trip along millionaires' row. It's a chance to see how the other half live, with sprawling mansions, premium water views and tennis courts seemingly in every direction.
Tucked at the far end of the prestigious strip overlooking the bay is this private oasis set on 3.5 hectares.
Hidden completely from the road, the contemporary house is the ultimate lifestyle property with impressive resort-style surrounds and uninterrupted views across the water to the You Yangs. Once inside the secure gates you can enjoy summer barbecues in the pool house or tennis on the floodlit synthetic court.
The house has been designed to maximise the outlook, with all the living areas concentrated on the northern side. And - as this is the kind of place you would definitely want to show off - it naturally provides ample opportunities for entertaining.
The main open-plan kitchen, meals and living area is the ideal gathering space and can easily accommodate a crowd. It offers some of the best views of the bay and achieves an uncluttered, modern look with industrial inspired concrete-like flooring and a neutral colour scheme.
In winter, sunlight streams in through the floor-to-ceiling bifold doors so the heater is rarely needed.
Like everything about the house, the kitchen is generously proportioned and well appointed. It has grey stone benchtops, a 900-millimetre stainless-steel oven and cooktop with canopy rangehood and a mosaic-tiled splashback. There's even a wine rack built in into the cabinetry.
There is a formal dining room (or potential third living room) next door but if casual dining is more your style it's just a short walk across the pool deck to the pool house.
Here you'll find a kitchenette, barbecue rangehood, pizza oven and space for an outdoor setting. Bifold doors run down two sides of the pool house and can be opened to catch the breeze depending on the season.
The swimming pool sits next to the tennis court and has a frameless glass fence.
Back inside, a rumpus room off the main living area provides another option for unwinding. It has carpet underfoot and white plantation shutters on the windows.
There are three bedrooms zoned together off a hallway at this end of the house, two with built-in wardrobes. Between them sits the laundry, toilet, powder room and bathroom, finished with earthy tones with a bath and shower.
The main bedroom is at the front of the house off the entrance hall, well away from the noise of older children. It announces its grand proportions with double doors and delivers a huge amount of space inside. It's a similar story in the en suite, which conceals a toilet and large shower behind either end of a long vanity, and in the walk-in wardrobe.
This bedroom has doors to a private courtyard, one of many outdoor areas around the property. Next door a study with plantation shutters offers a quiet place to work. There is a double garage attached to the house, plus a four-bay garage with a workshop and storage space.
Lou Rendina : 0418 525 415

Description:
Space, Style And Quality By The Bay
This immaculate home is sure to impress, offering more than meets the eye upon inspection. With nothing left to do except move in and enjoy all this fantastic location has to offer, just minutes from local amenities the Bellarine Peninsula provides and close proximity to the Geelong CBD. Included are three generous sized bedrooms, the oversized master tucked away at the rear of the home includes BIRs plus ensuite while the remaining bedrooms both benefit from BIRs and are serviced by the modern family bathroom. The cleverly designed floor plan includes two living spaces, so take your pick from relaxing in the formal sitting room, while for those family gatherings the open plan living space flows effortlessly out to the entertaining area, and low maintenance gardens with ample privacy. For the budding chef the kitchen will delight with stone benches, spacious island bench, 900mm oven, pantry, dishwasher plus plenty of cupboard space making with space both comfortable and fun to work with. Extra features such as central heating & cooling, double remote garage with internal access, top quality fittings and fixtures, garden shed, also within walking distance of the new Curlewis shopping centre, a short drive to Clifton Springs boat ramp, golf course, plus Drysdale township. This is not just a home you are buying, but a lifestyle, contact Julia on 0432 182 271 to inspect today.

Description:
BRAND NEW AND CUSTOM BUILT
Quality design, finishes and build are hallmarks of this outstanding brand new Hotondo home.
A fabulous kitchen with stone bench tops and European appliances with open plan family and meals area leads to a private deck and landscaped garden with the preferred northerly aspect.
Further accommodation includes four spacious bedrooms, the main with walk in robe and large ensuite, separate lounge or home theatre, kids zone and study.
A double garage, ducted heating, air conditioning, gas log fire, low E lighting, 2.7 metre ceilings, Blackbutt timber floors and quality shutter blinds complete this outstanding home.

Description:
Park the caravan & boats
Modern steel frame home with wide side access all the way to the back fence. With three living zones this family home would suit those seeking space or in need of a study / dining room & formal lounge.
A stylish welcoming shelter porch & double garage with internal access. A wide tiled entrance passage for hard wearing.
Large open plan kitchen with stone bench top, large 5 burner gas cooker, wall oven for convenience, double sink, stainless steel appliances & large fridge cavity.
Formal lounge or second casual living area, ideal for a home theatre.
Carpeted study, music den or formal dining area.
North facing alfresco to enjoy the sunshine.
Double holland privacy blinds in the bedrooms.
King size master bedroom with walk in robe & spacious ensuite.
Stylish bathroom with a spa bath.
Connected to the National Broadband Network
Separate gated side area.
Double privacy gates to lock away your caravan, boat, tradie trailer or all three.

Description:
Stage 3 Coriyule Estate- 400m2
Stage 3 pre-selling with Titles expected end of April 2016. The Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that the area has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is located virtually on your door step with the Clifton Springs marina a short distance down the road. A supermarket and specialty shops just minutes away. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Spacious Family Home - Peninsula Living
Built less than 4 years ago, this perfect family home offers all the comforts and space required with a sought after coastal lifestyle.
Immaculately maintained and smartly positioned on 543m2 of land with a North facing backyard. The easy flow, functional floor-plan allows versatility with open plan kitchen, living and dining. Positioned amongst other quality homes and less than 500 metres from the new Curlewis Shopping Centre and local parks, playgrounds and Bellarine Rail Trail. Enjoy being in close proximity to Clifton Springs Bay, local schools, Golf Courses, award winning wineries and the township of Drysdale.
* Impressive spacious entry and high ceilings
* 4 Bedrooms all with built-in-robes; master with walk-in-robe & large ensuite
* Open plan kitchen / dining / family room
* Stylish kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances
* Generous pantry and linen storage
* Versatile second living area
* Sliding doors in family room open onto outdoor deck
* Central spacious bathroom
* Good size laundry
* Solar hot water, ducted heating / split system air-conditioning
* Remote double garage with internal entry
* NBN connectivity
* Established low maintenance gardens
If you are looking for a spacious family home perfect for entertaining, then look no further!

Description:
Fabulous 1st Home!
Only 4 years old, this beautiful home is situated in Curlewis Parks Estate and is only minutes away from the brand new shopping centre, medical centre, pharmacy and a host of specialty shops. The master bedroom includes a WIR and ensuite with double vanity and large shower, while 2 other bedrooms include BIRs and ceiling fans with the 4th your choice of a bedroom or study. An open plan dining/living/kitchen is situated at the heart of the home with the kitchen including stone bench tops, dishwasher, 900mm oven, plenty of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances. When you venture through the sliding doors from the living area onto the outdoor deck you find it is the perfect place to entertain your guests and a roomy backyard is perfect for pets and kids. Other features of this beautiful home include internal access from the double garage, low maintenance gardens, ducted heating, split system cooling and spacious laundry. This home is a must inspect!

Description:
Boat & Caravan Friendly
This like new family residence offers all of the comforts and space required in a home on a generous 544m2 approx. block. The easy going floor plan takes you effortlessly from the master bedroom with walk-in robe & ensuite, to the light and bright front living space, through to the open plan kitchen, meals and second living area opening out to the beautiful deck overlooking the generous family backyard. At the rear of the home you will find a further three bedrooms with built-in robes alongside a third living space, although compact it's the perfect place for the PlayStation, just close the doors and let the kids play. This fantastic family home includes dishwasher, 900mm stove, walk-in pantry, ducted heating throughout, split system cooling and double garage with additional off-street parking behind lock-up gates ideal for boats, caravans, trailers etc. Located conveniently within walking distance to the Curlewis shopping centre with supermarket, medical centre, chemist, cafe and more. Only minutes to the boat ramp, golf course and the township of Drysdale. This opportunity boasts a lifestyle and value for money like no other. Inspect today before it's too late.
